name: UIEventAttribution
desc: An object that contains event attribution information for Private Click Measurement.

items.name: init(sourceIdentifier: UInt8, destinationURL: URL, sourceDescription: String, purchaser: String)
items.desc: Initializes a new event attribution object.

items.name: var purchaser: String
items.desc: The entity that purchased the ad or content.

items.name: var reportEndpoint: URL?
items.desc: The URL that receives attribution data.

items.name: var sourceDescription: String
items.desc: A string describing the source tapped to launch the external link.

items.name: var sourceIdentifier: UInt8
items.desc: A number that identifies the source of the attribution.
